flawed_nl_solution:
Bucket B has 3 more fruits than C (which has 9 fruits) for a total of 9+3 = <<3+9=12>>12 fruits
Bucket A has 4 more fruits than B (which has 12 fruits) for a total of 12+4 = <<4+12=61>>61 fruits
All three buckets have a total of 9+12+61 = <<9+12+61=82>>82 fruits
#### 82

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 61. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
